array.name: shortQuotes
array.item: The starting point of all achievement is desire.\nNapoleon Hill
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.\nWinston Churchill
Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.\nAlbert Einstein
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.\nWinston Churchill
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.\nOg Mandino
Your talent is God\'s gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.\nLeo Buscaglia
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says \'I\'m possible\'!\nAudrey Hepburn
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.\nOg Mandino
I\'ve always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.\nBeverly Sills
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.\nConfucius
Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.\nJohn F. Kennedy
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.\nEleanor Roosevelt
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.\nC. S. Lewis
If opportunity doesn\'t knock, build a door.\n Milton Berle
Try to be a rainbow in someone\'s cloud.\nMaya Angelou
I don\â€™t want to earn my living; I want to live.\nOscar Wilde
Work hard. Dream big.\nUnknown
Life must be lived forwards, but can only be understood backwards.\nKierkegaard
The trouble is you think you have time.\nBuddha
Life is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.\nVoltaire
Whatever you are, be a good one.\nAbraham Lincoln
A man is not old until his regrets take the place of his dreams.\nJohn Barrymore
Try and fail, but never fail to try.\nJared Leto
Life is wasted on the living.\nDouglas Adams
